name: Gloomhaven
className: product-grid__product expensive adventure exploration fantasy fighting miniatures show
description: Gloomhaven is a game of Euro-inspired tactical combat in a persistent world of shifting motives. Players will take on the role of a wandering adventurer with their own special set of skills and their own reasons for traveling to this dark corner of the world.

name: Pandemic Legacy
description: Pandemic Legacy is a co-operative campaign game, with an overarching story-arc played through 12-24 sessions, depending on how well your group does at the game.

name: Terraforming Mars
className: product-grid__product medium economic environmental industry science-fiction exploration territory-building show
description: In the 2400s, mankind begins to terraform the planet Mars. Giant corporations, sponsored by the World Government on Earth, initiate huge projects to raise the temperature, the oxygen level, and the ocean coverage until the environment is habitable.

name: Brass: Birmingham
className: product-grid__product expensive economic industry transportation show
description: Brass: Birmingham is an economic strategy game sequel to Martin Wallace' 2007 masterpiece, Brass. Birmingham tells the story of competing entrepreneurs in Birmingham during the industrial revolution, between the years of 1770-1870.

name: Through the Ages
className: product-grid__product medium card-game civilization economic show
description: Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization is the new edition of Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization, with many changes small and large to the game's cards over its three ages and extensive changes to how military works.

name: Twilight Imperium
className: product-grid__product expensive civilization economic negotiation political science-fiction exploration wargame show
description: Twilight Imperium (Fourth Edition) is a game of galactic conquest in which three to six players take on the role of one of seventeen factions vying for galactic domination through military might, political maneuvering, and economic bargaining.

name: 7 Wonders Duel
className: product-grid__product cheap ancient card-game city-building civilization show
description: In many ways 7 Wonders Duel resembles its parent game 7 Wonders as over three ages players acquire cards that provide resources or advance their military or scientific development in order to develop a civilization and complete wonders.

name: Race for the Galaxy
className: product-grid__product cheap card-game civilization economic science-fiction exploration show
description: In the card game Race for the Galaxy, players build galactic civilizations by playing game cards in front of them that represent worlds or technical and social developments.
imgalt: race for the galaxy cover art

name: Azul
description: In the game Azul, players take turns drafting colored tiles from suppliers to their player board. Later in the round, players score points based on how they've placed their tiles to decorate the palace.

name: Mage Knight
className: product-grid__product expensive adventure exploration fantasy fighting show
description: The Mage Knight board game puts you in control of one of four powerful Mage Knights as you explore (and conquer) a corner of the Mage Knight universe under the control of the Atlantean Empire.

name: Root
className: product-grid__product cheap animals fantasy wargame show
description: Root is a game of adventure and war in which 2 to 4 (1 to 6 with the 'Riverfolk' expansion) players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

name: Pandemic
description: In Pandemic, several virulent diseases have broken out simultaneously all over the world! The players are disease-fighting specialists whose mission is to treat disease hotspots while researching cures for each of four plagues before they get out of hand.
